spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall arrangement roughly follows the plan (bedroom zone at top, central kitchen/living, alfresco to the right, master/study/front zone at bottom), but multiple critical spatial mismatches exist. (1) Garage massing is substantially larger than the plan and reads as a double-bay rather than the single garage shown (E4/E5), affecting adjacent entry proportions. (2) Front external areas (verandah/portico) are not clearly separated/positioned as in the plan (E1/E2). (3) Several small-service spaces shown in plan (WIL/linen/recesses) are not consistently represented as distinct volumes, altering corridor/room geometry (E1/E4). (4) Door and window layouts do not reliably match the 2D openings, especially along the front and bedroom façades (E2/E3).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is generally consistent in the render, but fidelity to the plan’s structural partitioning is weak in key areas. Adjacency is only partially correct: living-to-alfresco connection exists, and bedroom cluster exists, but entry/garage/study/front-zone relationships are distorted by the enlarged garage and unclear portico/verandah definition (E2/E4). Multiple plan-defined micro-spaces (WIL, linen, recesses) are missing or merged (E1). The garage depiction introduces an extra bay/space not present in the plan (E5). Several interior door embeddings/openings appear simplified compared to the plan’s door count and swing placements (E2/E3).

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is plausible but does not map tightly to the plan’s intent. The plan indicates a dedicated theatre; the render shows lounge seating, but the theatre fit-out/placement is ambiguous and may be substituted by generic living seating (E2). Bedroom furnishing is generic and may not match window/robe/desk-recess constraints shown on plan (E2/E4). Scale is mostly consistent, but the oversized garage and some open areas make furniture-to-room scale unreliable in affected zones (E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable isometric-style render with coherent lighting and generally tidy geometry. Camera is close to isometric but still perspective-biased (minor). Materials are consistent and there are no major rendering artifacts. Visual clarity is good; however, some geometry simplification (missing recesses/closets and simplified openings) reduces architectural legibility relative to the plan.

detected_errors.description: Garage size/proportions are significantly larger than the floor plan, altering the front-right massing and internal adjacency.
Hallucinated double-car usage/extra bay implied: render shows two vehicles and a garage capacity inconsistent with the single garage shown in plan.
Verandah is not clearly present/defined in the render as a distinct front-left external space matching the plan.
Portico is not clearly present/defined as a distinct front entry element matching the plan.
Missing or merged storage/service micro-spaces from the plan (e.g., WIL, linen, and multiple labeled recess areas are not consistently modeled as distinct spaces).
Door placement/count is simplified versus the plan (multiple interior openings appear repositioned or omitted, especially around entry/corridor/service zones).
Several door orientations (swing direction/hinge side) are not verifiable as matching the 2D plan and appear generically assigned.
Window placement/pattern does not reliably match the plan’s façade openings (notably along bedroom and front elevations; glazing segments appear generalized).
Room proportion distortions likely in the front zone (entry/study/garage interface) due to the enlarged garage footprint and simplified external porch geometry.
